snippet.title: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World, Border Pioneer and Stray Path - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
A brand new trailer showing gameplay of three upcoming titles. In Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World, a dragon's breath turns you into a stickman, who must nevertheless conquer castles, plunder territories, or lead your squad. In Border Pioneer, you construct towns and fend off waves of attack from different enemies in order to expand your kingdom. Stray Path is a new card-battling adventure roguelite in which you must play your cards right to progress through a randomly-generated world.

Wishlist them today: 
Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2924170
Border Pioneer: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2346410 (there's a demo too)
Stray Path: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2531940 (also with a demo)

#convergenceshow #indiegame
